name: Glooble Gobble: A Day in the Life of Jack Bixby: The Story of our Lives
name_original: Glooble Gobble: A Day in the Life of Jack Bixby: The Story of our Lives
description:
Welcome to our game!!!
Created for Global Game Jam 2022, the theme is Duality

This is a simple game about exploring a space and drawing a pretty picture.

### Controls/Instructions ###

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Hit Enter to see your beautiful creation
When you're viewing, you can pan the camera by clicking and dragging
Also you can zoom by scrolling the mouse

### Sticker Mode ###
When you're satisfied press space to go into Sticker Mode!!!
You can click-and-drag the stickers around
Press A/D rotate them and press W/S scale them

When you're all done... hit space again to save your picture!!!!

Have fun!!!!!

### Credits ###

Jack Bixby - Music
Kory Byrne - Programming

### Attributions ###
Icons made from https://iconsflow.com/
Title font from https://inkpx.com/word-art-generator
Other font from https://www.fontspace.com/calm-avocado-font-f55123
